com.teamdev.jxmaps.swing

Class MapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • com.teamdev.jxmaps.swing.MapView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StyledMapExample

    public class MapView
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    Represents a Swing component that displays Google Map viewer instance and provides access to UI-related functionality. This component can be embedded into any Swing container such as JPanel.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setMapSize

        public void setMapSize(java.awt.Dimension size)

      • getMap

        public Map getMap()
        Returns Map object associated with view. Object can be accessed only after mapReady event fired.
        Returns:
        reference to map object

      • getPanorama

        public StreetViewPanorama getPanorama()
        Returns Street View object associated with view. Object can be accessed only after mapReady event fired and only this feature enabled in constructor.
        Returns:
        reference to map object

      • setOnMapReadyHandler

        public void setOnMapReadyHandler(MapReadyHandler handler)

      • getServices

        public MapServices getServices()
        Returns services manager object associated with map. Using this object a number of services can be requested (directions, elevation, etc.)
        Returns:
        Reference to services manager

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Dispose current object. Should be called to release all resources used by map viewer.

      • getImage

        @Nullable
public java.awt.Image getImage()
        Returns an image of the currently loaded map. The image size will be equal to the size of the MapViewer. This method is not supported in HEAVYWEIGHT mode and returns null.
        Returns:
        an image of the currently loaded map or null in case HEAVYWEIGHT mode.

      • setMapVisible

        public void setMapVisible(boolean visible)
        Set visiblity of the map. This property can be used for displaying street view panorama without map.
        Parameters:
        visible - - true in case map should be visible

      • setStreetViewVisible

        public void setStreetViewVisible(boolean visible)
        Set visiblity of the street view panorama.
        Parameters:
        visible - - true in case map should be visible

      • getStreetViewVisible

        public boolean getStreetViewVisible()
        Returns true in case street view panorama is visible.

      • getMapVisible

        public boolean getMapVisible()
        Returns true in case map is visible.

      • waitReady

        public void waitReady()
        Waits until map object is ready.
